articles.description: American health officials earlier in the week publicly rebuked the drugmaker for using 'outdated information' when calculating that the Covid-19 vaccine was 79% effective
articles.title: AstraZeneca Covid vaccine slightly less effective than 1st touted: 76% rather than 79% against virus - Mint

articles.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom nominated Assembly member Rob Bonta to be the state's next attorney general. He would be the first Filipino American to hold the post.
articles.title: Rob Bonta nominated to be California attorney general, would be first Filipino in role - NBC News

articles.description: The “Idol” judges were visibly concerned, with Katy Perry putting her hands up to her head, and Richie and Luke Bryan rushing over to the contestant.
articles.title: ‘American Idol’ contestant faints after audition and is hospitalized - New York Daily News
